CustomField.description: Ship To Contact's First Last Name and Mobile or Phone number
CustomField.formula: ShipToContact.FirstName & " " + ShipToContact.LastName & " / " & IF(ISBLANK(ShipToContact.MobilePhone), ShipToContact.Phone, ShipToContact.MobilePhone) & " / " + ShipToContact.Email
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Ship To Contact's First Last Name and Mobile or Phone number
CustomField.label: Int Contact Details
